data.name: ReadCaseRoleCase
data.value: select CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, REL_TO_AR from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE = 'CH') and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate)

data.name: ReadCsePerson1
data.value: select top(1) T1.NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T2.END_DATE >= @startDate) and (@casNumber = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (T2.TYPE = 'AR')

data.name: ReadCsePerson2
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, PAT_ESTAB_IND from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb
